{{{
public class BooleanYesNo extends Composite implements LeafValueEditor<Boolean> {

  interface BooleanYesNoUiBinder extends UiBinder<Widget, BooleanYesNo> {}
  private static BooleanYesNoUiBinder uiBinder = GWT.create(BooleanYesNoUiBinder.class);
  @UiField CheckBox yes;
  @UiField CheckBox no;
  
  private Presenter presenter;

  public BooleanYesNo() {
    initWidget(uiBinder.createAndBindUi(this));
  }
  
  public void setPresenter(Presenter presenter) {
    this.presenter = presenter;
  }

  @Override
  public void setValue(Boolean value) {
    if (value == null) {
      yes.setValue(false);
      no.setValue(false);
      
    } else if (value == true) {
      yes.setValue(true);
      no.setValue(false);
      
    } else if (value == false) {
      yes.setValue(false);
      no.setValue(true);
    }
  }

  @Override
  public Boolean getValue() {
    Boolean b = null;
    if (yes.getValue() == false && no.getValue() == false)  {
      b = null;
    } else if (yes.getValue() == true) {
      b = true;
    } else if (no.getValue() == true) {
      b = false;
    }
    return b;
  }

  @UiHandler("yes")
  void onYesClick(ClickEvent event) {
    presenter.setRunning(true);
    if (yes.getValue() == true) {
      no.setValue(false);
    }
    presenter.setRunning(true);
  }
  
  @UiHandler("no")
  void onNoClick(ClickEvent event) {
    presenter.setRunning(true);
    if (no.getValue() == true) {
      yes.setValue(false);
    }
  }
  
}
